official_title: A bill to direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to make grants to the Upper Occoquan Sewage Authority to reimburse such Authority for a portion of the costs incurred by such Authority in constructing its advanced waste water treatment plant in the Occoquan Reservoir watershed area in Fairfax County, Virginia.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to reimburse the Upper Occoquan Sewage Authority for 50 percent of its costs in constructing the advanced waste water treatment plant in the Occoquan Reservoir watershed area of Fairfax County, Virginia. Limits the amount of such Federal assistance to a specified sum. Requires that the Administrator first receive reasonable assurances that the Authority will use such Federal assistance to reduce the sewer rates charged to customers in Fairfax and Prince William Counties, Virginia, and in Manassas and Manassas Park, Virginia.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to make grants to the Upper Occoquan Sewage Authority to reimburse such Authority for a portion of the costs incurred by such Authority in constructing its advanced waste water treatment plant in the Occoquan Reservoir watershed area in Fairfax County, Virginia.
